newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bus ploughs through bazaar, kills 12 Bangladeshis.
newsitem.headline: Bus ploughs through bazaar, kills 12 Bangladeshis.

text.p: At least 12 people were killed on Sunday when a speeding bus ploughed through a crowded roadside vegetable market in eastern Comilla, 60 miles (100 km) from the capital Dhaka, the official BSS news agency said.

Eight of the victims died on the spot while four others died later at hospital. Local people, angered by the accident, barricaded the Dhaka-Chittagong highway which disrupted communications, the agency said.
